name: VR TRIBES
description:
VR TRIBES offers an action-packed and strategic multiplayer game. As a VR player you take on the role of Meteor and try to conquer the island you landed on.
In contrast, as a PC player, your task is to successfully defend the island together with your fellow players.

PLAY TWO DIFFERENT GAMEMODES ON VARIOUS MAPS

GAMEMODE "CLASH"
  • play on three different "minimaps"
  • defeat the METEOR (VR Player)
  • use your abilities

GAMEMODE "ISLAND"
  • play on one big map
  • attack the METEOR to get his crucial crystals
  • try to destroy the crystals on different points on the map
  • ATTENTION: minor performance impacts may occur, use lower graphics settings
  • performance issues will be fixed during the early access

MIXED GAMEPLAY ACTION

The VR player


  • 360° overview and action
  • shoot, grab, throw, punch
  • fight against the PC players

The PC player

  • play as one of the three main characters
  • use your special abilities
  • attack the VR player with bombs and cannons

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES

Play online or LAN

  • join forces and play 3 vs 1 on mixed platforms
  • communicate and choose the best tactics


VR Platforms

Compatible VR Headsets

  • Oculus Quest 2 Link and Airlink
  • Valve Index
  • HTC Vive
